name: Heavy Souls
description:
This is a Text adventure game were the stories you play are based in the weight of the main character. I never did nothing like this so it's my first time doing adventure games.

Also 

if you find a bug or something that isn't written correctly please comment below!
English is not my principal lang ^^"
And many thanks for playing! good luck with your game in this jam!

****

Controls: 
Mouse Left Click - Select option

Music by: PixelBeats
